Police refer 14-year-old to Youth Aid Services after woman loses finger in carjacking at West Auckland pool centre https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-refer-14-year-old-to-youth-aid-services-after-woman-loses-finger-in-carjacking-at-west-auckland-泳池中心/3EQWR5R3QRB7DGM2NSRDX6N2A4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-refer-14-year-old-to-youth-aid-services-after-woman-loses-finger-in-carjacking-at-west-auckland-泳池中心/3EQWR5R3QRB7DGM2NSRDX6N2A4/ Lincoln TanHenderson-Massey Local Board member says carjacking an isolated incident Thu, 12 Sep 2024 04:13:49 +0000 A police investigation is underway after a woman was seriously injured in a carjacking at Henderson's West Wave Pool and Leisure Centre carpark. Photo / Street View

Thu, 12 Sep 2024 04:00:00 +0000 A new report has talked of the importance of driver education and road rule enforcement while revealing some of the causes of crashes in Hawke's Bay. Photo / NZME

Photo / Sylvie Whinray

Lawyer Leuatea Iosefa who stole elderly client’s life savings is allowed to practise again https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lawyer-leuatea-iosefa-jailed-for-stealing-life- savings-from-elderly-client-is-allowed-to-practise-law-again/LDTOJBFS5ZARTBGVIUAMQZFGGI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lawyer-leuatea-iosefa-jailed-for-stealing-life- savings-from-elderly-client-is-allowed-to-practise-law-again/LDTOJBFS5ZARTBGVIUAMQZFGGI/ Jeremy WilkinsonLeuatea Iosefa stole $83,000 from a widow and used it to pay off his own debts. Waikato crash: Police seek footage of fatal State Highway 5 crash at Tapapa https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/waikato-crash-police-seek-footage-of-fatal-state-highway-5-crash-at-tapapa/OBIM4COT3BGUXNB3FDU4QKCVHU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/waikato-crash-police-seek-footage-of-fatal-state-highway-5-crash-at-tapapa/OBIM4COT3BGUXNB3FDU4QKCVHU/ One person died at the scene and three people were seriously injured. Thu, 12 Sep 2024 02:58:43 +0000 Police are asking if anyone has dashcam footage of the events before the crash, or other information that can help the crash investigation.
